de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore

Class UrlParameterBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.UrlParameterBundle

  • public class UrlParameterBundle
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that can be used to create and parse URL encoded Strings to store and transmit data in.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    chrwuer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UrlParameterBundle()
      Creates an empty UrlParameterBundle object.
      UrlParameterBundle(java.lang.String url)
      Creates a new UrlParameterBundle object and populates it with the values from the given URL String

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

        public UrlParameterBundle put(java.lang.String key,
                     java.lang.Object value)

        Parameters:

        value - the value. Keep in mind that all values are stored as String.
